details:
Two fixes for the Classic UI:


* fix off-by-one memory access in process\_cgivars() ([CVE-2013-7108](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2013-7108))
* prevent possible buffer overflows in cmd.cgi ([CVE-2014-1878](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2014-1878))


For Debian 6 Squeeze, these issues have been fixed in icinga version 1.0.2-2+squeeze2
